Class GuiHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.altsai.bacon.GuiHandler

  • public class GuiHandler
extends Object
    Handles GUI functionality and interaction with a given database.
    Author:
    Alison Tsai

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GuiHandler(String db)
      GuiHandler constructor; initializes connection to database and sets up Autocorrector and GraphLoader.
